Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by you. I understand the importance of this investment for you and would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time, I am willing to sell the product to you at $9,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a price that is only $500 more than its perceived value to you. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
